Interface ErrorOutInterface

Created 10-06-10

Changelog available at ErrorOutInterface.

All Known Implementing Classes:
ErrorOut
public interface ErrorOutInterface

Master list of all errors found in the given source code and all data
relative to them, represented in an array.

Author:
Austin & Jeff

Method Summary
 void add(ErrorData erroneousEntry)
          Method to add errors-by-line to the master list of errors in the
source code.
 boolean errorAtLine(int lineNumber)
          Determines whether or not an error exists at a certain line.
 boolean errorExists(ErrorData err)
          Returns whether or not the error exists in the master list.
 java.lang.String output(ErrorData entry)
          Returns a string with a formatted message including the Error Code
and error message, complete with line number.
 ErrorData search(int lineNumber)
          Searches through the master list of errors and returns the error
at the specified line.
 

Method Detail

add

void add(ErrorData erroneousEntry)
Method to add errors-by-line to the master list of errors in the
source code.

Parameters:
erroneousEntry - The error data to be added to the master list.

search

ErrorData search(int lineNumber)
Searches through the master list of errors and returns the error
at the specified line. NOTE: Given the current implementation,
the error MUST EXIST inside of the list, or it will simply return
the last error in the list.

Parameters:
lineNumber - The line where the error exists at.
Returns:
The error at the line number.

errorExists

boolean errorExists(ErrorData err)
Returns whether or not the error exists in the master list.

Parameters:
err - The error whose existence is in question.
Returns:
True iff the error exists in the master list, false otherwise.

output

java.lang.String output(ErrorData entry)
Returns a string with a formatted message including the Error Code
and error message, complete with line number.

Parameters:
entry - The error whose information you want outputted.
Returns:
A string with all data components from the requested ErrorData object.

errorAtLine

boolean errorAtLine(int lineNumber)
Determines whether or not an error exists at a certain line.

Parameters:
lineNumber - The line in question.
Returns:
True iff there is an error at that line, false otherwise.
